subject: Chauncy x Simsonn UGC Inquiry for Instagram/TikTok?
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,


I hope you’re having a wonderful week! I know your time is valuable, so
I'll keep it short. I'm a UGC creator that specializes in creating organic,
cinematic, and storytelling content to get brands like you in front of
thousands and increase ad returns.


My services include creating UGC for organic videos, paid ads,
whitelisting, and monthly contracts. Please find my portfolio down below!
Portfolio <https://ugc-chauncy.com/>


If you're open to hearing more about how I can help, I’d love to hop on a
quick call, or we can continue the conversation here.


Best,
Chauncy Smith
